pr_title: Extract issuer dn from certificate as x509 attribute

timeline.message:
extract issuer dn as x509 attribute

also allow specification of subject Dn format since default format is listed as "denigrated" in javadocs

timeline.bodyText: It would also be good to design a table in the docs preferably in this section to describe the meaning of each format string, similar to this
timeline.author: mmoayyed
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2493,6 +2493,9 @@ To fetch CRLs, the following options are available:
 # cas.authn.x509.refreshIntervalSeconds=3600
 # cas.authn.x509.maxPathLengthAllowUnspecified=false
 
+# SUBJECT_DN

replies.bodyText: OK, I added a table with a description of each value.
replies.author: hdeadman

timeline.message: Add table to document config values
